name: Tweaked Dark Live Chat for YouTube
description: Just a fix for the search-box drop-list and little tweaks to the chat itself.
additional_info:
Update 5/12/2019
Minor changes

Update 27/10/2017
I've added a "pulsing" effect to "Live Now" label, because... meh.

Update 16/5/2017
You can now change the color of names in the avatars

Update 3/8/2017
I guess I love animations so I've added a fade effect on chat :D
I've also fixed the color of the "Like" and "Dislike" count.
